Quick search

PyPreTools module¶

This file provides functions to convert descriptors list of multiple molecules (dicts) into CSV If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. E-mail: biomed@csu.edu.cn

@File name: PyPreTools @author: Jie Dong and Zhijiang Yao

PyPreTools.DictToCSV(MultiDictList, csvOutPath)[source]¶

Convert descriptors list of multiple molecules (dicts) into CSV :param MultiDictList: a list contains multiple dicts :param csvOutPath: path to save CSV file :return: csvOutPath

PyPreTools.ListToCSV(MultiList, csvOutPath, Name='Des')[source]¶

Convert descriptors list of multiple molecules (lists) into CSV :param MultiList: a list contains multiple lists :param csvOutPath: path to save CSV file :return: csvOutPath

PyPreTools.TupleToCSV(MultiTupleList, csvOutPath, Name='Des')[source]¶

Convert descriptors list of multiple molecules (tuple) into CSV :param MultiTupleList: a list contains multiple lists :param csvOutPath: path to save CSV file :return: csvOutPath
